sentences: Mahmoud Khoshnam (Persian: محمود خوشنام, Iran, 27 April 1935 – 14 March 2021) was an Iranian music critic.
From 1960 he was the editor of Music Review magazine (Majale-ye Musighi) in Tehran.
A selection of Khoshnam articles/interviews was published in Sweden in 1998 titled "In the Field of Music"
